author: nero_eth
content: Yeah true, it would more be about enabling better parallelization strategies by ensuring you don't end up with all big tx on one core and small ones that just claimed to be big (high tx gas limit) on a different one. However, I do thing that BAL size, tx gas limit + balance diff of sender + fee recipient are more than good enough proxies for that.

author: _shemnon
content: There are still ways to break parallization even with that, for example one giant TX chain (like a popular NFT mint might trigger) either by account or slot dependency.
